fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: OTE Group currently follows a wide range of initiatives and policies in the fields of telecommunications and media being developed by the European institutions, including DG Connect, other European Commission Directorates, the European Parliament and the European Council.  This currently includes the proposals for a European Electronic Communications Code.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
OTE S.A. and Cosmote are members of a number of associations, notably: 
 
*  European Network Operators Association (ETNO) 
*  International Telecommunications Union (ITU) 
*  European Telecommunications Standards Institute     (ETSI)     
*  Greek Mobile Industry Association (EEKT) 
 
More information is given in OTE’s 2016 Sustainability Report, available from the following link: 
 
https://www.cosmote.gr/fixed/documents/10280/204407148/report2016_eng.pdf/fcccf667-02af-4323-b901-bc92b281ab73
position: General Counsel, Chief Legal and Regulatory Affairs Officer OTE Group
relevant_communication: OTE Group publishes a range of material setting out its policies and activities including its Annual Report and its annual Sustainability Report. Details are available at   https://www.cosmote.gr.
goals__remit: OTE S.A., together with its mobile subsidiary Cosmote, is Greece's leading telecommunications organization,  providing high-quality fixed-line (voice, broadband, data and leased lines), TV and mobile products and services to its customers. It also provides fixed and mobile services in Romania, through Telekom Romania and Telekom Mobile Romania, and mobile services in Albania through its subsidiary Telekom Albania.   OTE S.A. is also involved in a range of other activities in Greece, notably in real-estate and professional training.  OTE is listed in Athens and London.
